dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 3513 IH: EANS Extension Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Lawler introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and the Workforce

form.official-title: To extend the availability of funds for Emergency Assistance to Non-Public Schools under the Education Stabilization Fund and the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the EANS Extension Act.

section.header: Extending the availability of EANS funds

subsection.text: Notwithstanding any other provision of law, any funds reserved under section 312(a)(2) of division M of title III of the Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2021 (Public Law 116–260; 134 Stat. 1925) shall remain available through September 30, 2023, and shall be subject to the requirements of section 421(b) of the General Education Provisions Act (20 U.S.C. 1225(b)).

paragraph.text: Section 2002(a) of the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 (Public Law 117–2; 135 Stat. 23) is amended by striking 2023 and inserting 2024.
The amendment made by paragraph (1) shall be subject to the requirements of section 421(b) of the General Education Provisions Act (20 U.S.C. 1225(b)).
